sentences.en: Accountable Document Status Report must be approved by Finance Director.
sentences.cn: 控管文件情况报告必须经财务总监审批.

sentences.en: Be Accountable: Your health and well - being is your responsibility.
sentences.cn: 负起责任: 你的健康幸福是你的责任.

sentences.en: Both will be held accountable for their deeds in this life.
sentences.cn: 谁也不能违反各自的生活准则.

sentences.en: But I also believe that everyone who comments here should be accountable: in other words that the rest of us should be able to see who they are.
sentences.cn: 但我同样认为，在这里发表评论的每一个人都应当受到问责：换而言之，在其发言时，我们其他人应当能够知道他们是谁。

sentences.en: Every person is accountable for his own work.
sentences.cn: 每个人都要对自己的工作负责.

sentences.en: He is mentally ill and cannot be held accountable for his actions.
sentences.cn: 他有精神病,不能对自己的行为负责.

sentences.en: His bad temper is easily accountable; he has had a toothache all day.
sentences.cn: 他的坏脾气是容易理解的, 因他整日牙痛.

sentences.en: I am accountable to my superiors for my actions.
sentences.cn: 我应该为自己的行为对上司负责.

sentences.en: If anything happens to this car, I will hold you accountable.
sentences.cn: 这辆车如果出什么问题, 我就惟你是问.

sentences.en: It is a very accountable obstinacy.
sentences.cn: 这是一种完全可以理解的固执态度.

sentences.en: One of the principles of our legal system is that people are accountable for the foreseeable consequences of their actions.
sentences.cn: 我们的法律体系的原则之一是人们要对他们可以预见的行为后果负责。

sentences.en: Politicians are ultimately accountable to the voters.
sentences.cn: 从政者最终是向选民负责。

sentences.en: The answer is simple: We will hold North Korea accountable.
sentences.cn: 答案很简单: 我们将让北韩承担责任.

sentences.en: The hospital should be held accountable for the quality of care it gives.
sentences.cn: 医院应当对医护质量负责。

sentences.en: The major service industries should be accountable to their customers.
sentences.cn: 主要的服务行业应该对它们的顾客负责。

sentences.en: The president struck back at critics who say he should be held accountable for conditions that contributed to the riots.
sentences.cn: 一些批评家指出总统应对导致骚乱局面的情形负责，总统对此予以驳斥。

sentences.en: You beat them up, and nobody holds you accountable.
sentences.cn: 殴打他们.你们不用向任何人负责.
